metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39202 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written inPHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. In affected versions thewidgets editor introduced in WordPress 5.8 beta 1 has improper handling ofHTML input in the Custom HTML feature. This leads to stored XSS in thecustom HTML widget. This has been patched in WordPress 5.8. It was onlypresent during the testing/beta phase of WordPress 5.8.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
